Direct-To | April 2017
Flight Technical Services Q&A <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Apr2017/FTSQAApr17]]>
Final Update - Advisory Vertical Guidance with No Published Vertical Descent Angle
Honeywell has included all stepdown fixes removed from B&GA navigation databases due to the Advisory Vertical Guidance issue... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Apr2017/FTSQAApr17]]>
GoDirect Flight Sentinel Briefing <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Apr2017/GoDirectFS]]> A Primer on US ATC Delays
In this month’s briefing, two of Flight Sentinel’s Flight Control Specialists look at common delays and what they mean to pilots and passengers when trying to depart... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Apr2017/GoDirectFS]]> Russian Airspace Change <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Apr2017/RussiaQNH]]> Russia Moving to QNH
In 2011, Russia adopted standard ICAO Flight Levels (in feet) for enroute traffic above transition level. Now they have begun moving airports to QNH-based operations... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Apr2017/RussiaQNH]]>
NZ FMS 6.1 <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Apr2017/61FullMarket]]> Full Market Conversion Highlights
In a continuing effort to keep the legacy fleet up to date with current technology and mandates, Honeywell has released software version 6.1 for all NZ FMS equipped aircraft.... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Apr2017/61FullMarket]]>
MyMaintainer <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Apr2017/MyMaintainer]]> App Provides Fault Transfer, Decoding, and Analysis
The MyMaintainer app was built to analyze and troubleshoot fault and operating data generated by Honeywell EPIC systems... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/Apr2017/MyMaintainer]]>
